page.title: 04Farming in the valley
page.content: Farming is the main occupation in our area.I live on a farm and we have a friesian pedigree herd.There are Herefords,Shorthorns,Ling and Simmental cows on other farms.Most farmers have a lot of Herdwick sheep and there are Swaledales,Cheviots,Suffolks and Teasdales.Most people have border collie sheepdogs and they are clever with the sheep.A farmer has a busy year.In April he is lambing,in May he is smitting,in June there is silage and hay,in July shearing and dipping and in October there is tupping.
